subject: Baseball
Robberies and Thefts
lead_paragraph: A 38-year-old former employee of pitcher Bronson Arroyo was arrested in Tampa, Fla., and accused of stealing and then selling Arroyo’s yacht after telling him it had sunk.
snippet: A 38-year-old former employee of pitcher Bronson Arroyo was arrested in Tampa, Fla., and accused of stealing and then selling Arroyo’s yacht after telling him it had sunk.
